Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Uha hasati bahuta barakata vali hai jisa ne apane bade (muhamada) te kura'ana utari'tam ki uha duni'a vali'am nu praloka da dara suna'una vala hove
Uha jisa la'i akasam ate dharati di badasahi hai ate usa ne ko'i putara nahim bana'i'a ate badasahi vica usa da ko'i sarika nahim. Usa ne hara cija nu paida kita ate usa da ika adaza niradharita kita

Ate lokam ne usa tom bina ajihe hora pujanika bana la'e hana. Jihare kise ciza nu paida nahim kara sakade, uha khuda paida kite ga'e hana. Ate uha khuda apane la'i na hani da adhikara rakhade hana ate na labha da. Ate na uha kise mauta da adhikara rakhade hana ate na kise de jivana da ate na mara ke mura jivata hona da
Ate inakari loka akhade hana ki iha sirafa managharata galam hana jihari'am inham ne ghari'am hai. Ate kujha duje lokam ne isa vica usa di madada kiti hai. Tam iha loka zulama ate jhutha de dosi ho'e
Ate uha akhade hana ki iha pahile lokam di'am kahani'am hana, jinham nu inham ne likhava li'a hai. Ate uha inham nu savere sama parha rahe hana
Akho, ki isa nu usa ne utari'a hai, jihara akasam ate dharati de bhedam nu janada hai. Besaka uha mu'afa karana vala ate rahimata karana vala hai

Ate uha akhade hana ki iha kiho jiha rasula hai, jihara bhojana khanda hai. Ate bazaram vica ghumada phirada hai. Ki'um na usa de kola ko'i farisata bheji'a gi'a jihara usa de nala rahi ke hada'ita karada
Jam usa la'i ko'i khazana utari'a janda. Jam usa la'i ko'i baga huda usa vicom uha khanda. Ate zalimam ne akhi'a ki tusim loka ika jadu
tom prabhavita bade da palana kara rahe ho. Dokho, uha kiho jihi'am hujatam tuhade la'i bi'ana kara rahe hana, isa la'i uha bhataka ga'e hana, phira uha raha nahim pa sakade

Uha alaha bahuta barakata vala hai. Jekara uha cahe tam tuhanu usa tom vi bihatara ciza pradana kara deve. Ajihe baga jinham de hetham nahiram vagadi'am hona ate tuhanu bahuta sare mahila bakhasa deve
Sagom unham ne ki'amata nu jhuthala dita hai. Ate asim ajihe badi'am la'i jihare ki'amata nu jhuthala'una, unham la'i naraka ti'ara kara rakhi'a hai
Jadom uha unham nu dura tom vekhega tam uha usa de guse da josa ate dhahara sunanage
Tai jadom iha usa (naraka) de kise bhire tham te banha ke suta dite janage â€œtam uha ute mauta nu hakam maranage
Aja ika mauta nu na hakam maro sagom anekam mautam nu pukaro
Akho, ki iha bihatara hai jam hamesa rahina vali janata, jisa da va'ada alaha ne prahezagaram la'i kita hai. Iha unham la'i amalam da fala ate tikana hovegi
Janata vica unham la'i uha sara kujha hazira hovega, jihara kujha uha cahunage. Uha usa vica hamesa rahinage. Iha tere raba de zime ika va'ada hai. Jisa da pura hona lazami hai

Ate jisa dina alaha unham nu ikathi'am karega ate unham nu jinham nu uha alaha tom ilava pujade hana, ikatara karega. Phira uha akhega, ki tusim mere inham badi'am nu bhataka'i'a jam uha khuda raha tom bhataka ga'e

Uha kahinage ki teri hasati paka hai. Sade la'i iha yoga nahim si ki tere tom bina kise dusare nu kama bana'una vala pravana karade. Paratu tusi unham nu ate unham dem pi'u-dadi'am nu isatemala la'i ni'amatam bakhasi'am, ithom taka ki uha tere upadesa nu bhula ga'e ate khatama hona vale bane

Tam unham ne tuhanu tuhadi'am hi galam vica jhutha thahira dita. Huna na tusim khuda tala sakade ho. Ate na hi ko'i madada prapata kara sakade ho. Ate tuhade vicom jihara bada zulama karega, asim usa nu ika vadi saza cakhavange

Ate asim tuhade tom pahilam jinhe vi paigabara bheje hana uha sare bhojana khande si ate bazaram vica turade phirade si. Ate asim tuhanu ika duje de la'i azama'isa bana'i'a. Ki tusim sabara karade ho. Ate tuhada raba sara kujha dekhada hai
